messages.body: $TSLA BREAKING NEWS: Elon Musk photographed driving secret new TSLA Model: https://www.greencarreports.com/news/1102439_tesla-model-s-radio-flyer-ludicrous-mode-for-junior

links.title: Tesla Model S Radio Flyer: Ludicrous Mode For Junior
links.description: Now there's a Tesla electric car for people that aren't even old enough to drive yet. Radio Flyer collaborated with Tesla to make a Model S for kids, and it could be the perfect way to indoctrinate tomorrow's potential electric-car buyers while they're young.

messages.body: $TSLA @f16falcon I guess he thinks Business Insider is real news now. So how about those battery punctures? Tripp formally filed with SEC. http://www.businessinsider.com/tesla-model-3-scrap-waste-high-gigafactory-2018-5

links.title: Internal documents reveal Tesla is blowing through an insane amount of raw material and cash to make Model 3s, and production is still a nightmare
links.description: About one-third of the raw material Tesla tries to turn into Model 3s at its Gigafactory ends up as scrap, internal documents show. It's not efficient. It's not environmentally friendly. It's not technologically impressive. And it might not be safe either.

links.title: Options Flow Alerts - Friday 7/20
links.description: The SPX barely held 2800 Friday. Just barely. You know big money wanted it above that key level. We did a day trade and sold the 2800/2790 SPX PUT SPREAD and collected 190. I bought it back for a 50% win, but had I held it would have expired worthless.

links.title: Tesla updates Model 3 order confirmation page to bolster 5-minute delivery process
links.description: Tesla recently rolled out a new order confirmation page for Model 3 buyers, as the company pushes to further streamline its vehicle delivery process. Tesla appears to be introducing the updated Model 3 confirmation page in tandem with the new 5-minute "Sign & Drive" system, which was rolled out earlier this month.

messages.body: $TSLA This translates into millions of EVs per year https://cleantechnica.com/2018/05/09/aaa-survey-finds-20-of-americans-plan-to-buy-an-electric-car/

links.title: AAA Survey Finds 20% Of Americans Plan To Buy An Electric Car
links.description: Clean Transport Last year, AAA began asking Americans if they planned to buy an electric car. 15% said yes. AAA plans to ask the same question every year and track the results - at least until electric cars become the norm. This year, 20% of Americans said they are considering an electric car for their next vehicle purchase.

links.title: Elon Musk is a total fraud
links.description: One disastrous tweet has finally revealed Elon Musk for what he is: a fraud. Enraged that a British cave diver called his idea to rescue the Thai soccer team for what it was - "a p.r. stunt [with] absolutely no chance of working" - Musk took to Twitter and called him a "pedo."
